Class UserService

java.lang.Object
com.builderportfolio.service.UserService
public class UserService extends Object
Service layer class responsible for handling all user-related business logic.

This includes: - User registration - Login authentication - Fetching user details

It coordinates between DAO classes and applies validation rules.

  • Method Details

    • registrationService

      public boolean registrationService(User user, int role)
      Registers a new user in the system.

      This method: - Checks if the email is already registered - Saves the user in the database - Creates role-specific records (Builder or Project Manager)

      Parameters:
      user - the User object containing registration details
      role - role selected by the user (1 = Builder, 2 = Project Manager)
      Returns:
      true if registration is successful
      Throws:
      UserAlreadyExistsException - if the email is already registered
      IllegalArgumentException - if the role is invalid

    • loginService

      public User loginService(String enteredUserId, String enteredPassword)
      Authenticates user login credentials.
      Parameters:
      enteredUserId - user ID entered during login
      enteredPassword - password entered during login
      Returns:
      the logged-in User object if credentials are valid
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the user ID does not exist
      InvalidCredentialsException - if the password is incorrect

    • fetchUserDetails

      public User fetchUserDetails(String userId)
      Retrieves user details using user ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - unique ID of the user
      Returns:
      User object containing user information
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if no user exists with the given ID
